Introduction

  • Account Manager* (AM):

Context

An Account Manager can have many campaigns running and a campaign can be running in many DPS. Before Account Managers (AMs) used to pull back all data of a running campaign on different DPS. Every morning they log on each DPS and extract an excel file containing data related of the running campaign.

Definition

Campaign Monitoring Tool (CMT) is about automating ….

Important!

Insertion order must be correctly named to avoid buggs. The best way to do that is to use Campaign Naming Tool providing for this particular task.
